txt.en: 'Within the past moon, our ancestors have begun to rise from their resting places here in the Bonevales. These once-great heroes' bodies have been twisted and corrupted and attack those who still draw breath.\n\n'If you journey south and west into the valley, you will come across these terrible wights. Defeat them, if you would, for such an abomination should not be permitted to continue.'
'Unlike the Lich Bluffs to the north, this place has always remained undisturbed, until now. We must discover what has caused the wights to walk among us.'
Corrupted by a fell power, the interred bodies of the Dunlending ancestors have begun to rise from their resting places.
Wights can be found in the valley south and west from Bledhun's camp.\n\nBledhun asked you to enter the Bonevales and defeat the wights that have arisen from the cairns.
Bledhun awaits you at his camp, north and east of the wight-infested valley.\n\nYou should return to Bledhun with news of your victory.
